row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PRV.JOB.CREATE_USER_PROVIDED_SERVICE@GENERIC
row.description: Create user provided service in Cloud Foundry

row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.EXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT !------------------------------------------ LOGGING INPUT PARAMETERS ------------------------------------------ : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Authentication Token" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_AUTHTOKEN#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Service Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_SERVICE_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Syslog" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_SYSLOG#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!--Checking if atleast one service credentials or syslog is provided :SET &UC4RB_CF_REQ_INPUTS# = 0
:IF &UC4RB_CF_CREDENTIALS# = '' : IF &UC4RB_CF_SYSLOG# = '' : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "At least one (Service Credentials or Syslog) is required to create user defined service" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR : SET &UC4RB_CF_REQ_INPUTS# = 1 : SET &UC4RB_CF_RETCODE# = &UC4RB_CF_REQ_INPUTS# : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_CF_REQ_INPUTS# = 0 !------------------------------------------ PREPARE AUTH DETAILS ---------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.PREP_AUTHINFO : IF &UC4RB_CF_RETCODE# = 0 ! -------------------------------------Building input parameters----------------------------------------------- : SET &UC4RB_CF_CUPS_CLA# ="cf cups "
!------------------------ Service Name -------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CF_SERVICE_NAME# : SET &UC4RB_CF_CUPS_CLA# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_CUPS_CLA#, "&UC4RB_CF_SERVICE_NAME#")
!----------------------- Credentials --------------------------------------------------------------------------
:IF &UC4RB_CF_CREDENTIALS# <> '' !---- Create temporary file to write in provided json :SET &UC4RB_CF_FILECONTENTS# = &UC4RB_CF_CREDENTIALS# :SET &UC4RB_CF_CONFIGFILE_TMP# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_HOMEDIR#,&SEPARATOR#) :SET &UC4RB_CF_CONFIGFILE_TMP# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_CONFIGFILE_TMP#,"tmpcredentials.json")
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.CREATE_FILE &UC4RB_CF_CONFIGFILE# = &UC4RB_CF_CONFIGFILE_TMP#
: IF &UC4RB_CF_RETCODE# = 0 !-- Reading file contents to make contents fall in single line ------------------------------------------------------ : DEFINE &UC4RB_CF_CONFIG_TMP#,string :SET &HND#=PREP_PROCESS_FILE(&AGENT#,&UC4RB_CF_CONFIGFILE_TMP#)
:PROCESS &HND# : SET &LINE#=GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : SET &UC4RB_CF_CONFIG_TMP# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_CONFIG_TMP#,&LINE#) :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
:PRINT " Service credentials &UC4RB_CF_CONFIG_TMP#"
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CF_CONFIG_TMP# : SET &UC4RB_CF_CUPS_CLA# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_CUPS_CLA#, " -p &UC4RB_CF_CONFIG_TMP#") : CASE "UNIX" : SET &UC4RB_CF_CUPS_CLA# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_CUPS_CLA#, " -p '&UC4RB_CF_CONFIG_TMP#'") : OTHER :ENDSWITCH : ENDIF
:ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_CF_RETCODE# = 0 !------------------------------- Syslog :IF &UC4RB_CF_SYSLOG# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_CF_SYSLOG# = STR_CAT("syslog://",&UC4RB_CF_SYSLOG#) : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CF_SYSLOG# : SET &UC4RB_CF_CUPS_CLA# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_CUPS_CLA#, " -l &UC4RB_CF_SYSLOG#") :ENDIF
! LOGGING CF COMMAND : PRINT "EXECUTING CF CREATE USER DEFINED SERVICE COMMAND: &UC4RB_CF_CUPS_CLA#" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = STR_CAT( "EXECUTING CF CREATE USER DEFINED SERVICE COMMAND: ", &UC4RB_CF_CUPS_CLA#) : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
! ------------------------------------------ INVOKING CF COMMAND LINE ------------------------------------------ &UC4RB_CF_CUPS_CLA# : ENDIF
: ENDIF
:ENDIF
!Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** CREATE USER DEFINED SERVICE ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** CREATE USER DEFINED SERVICE ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ ERROR HANDLING ---------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

row.post_process: !------------------------------------------ UPDATE AUTH INFO INTO VARA OBJECT ------------------------------------------ : SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") : IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.UPDATE_AUTHINFO : ENDIF
